alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 4:51PM MST until January 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds possible. Snow accumulations in the valleys of 1 to 4 inches is likely on Friday with an additional 1 to 4 inches on Saturday. In the mountains, up to 8 inches is possible on Friday with an additional 8 inches possible Saturday. Wind gusts to 50 mph are possible Friday. Wind gusts to 30 mph are possible Saturday. * WHERE...Island Park and Kilgore. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
